auth-concurrent-override.help: Enable/disable overriding the policy-auth-concurrent under config system global.
auth-concurrent-override.name: auth-concurrent-override

auth-concurrent-value.help: Maximum number of concurrent logins permitted from the same user.
auth-concurrent-value.name: auth-concurrent-value

authtimeout.help: Time in minutes before the authentication timeout for a user is reached.
authtimeout.name: authtimeout

ldap-server.help: Name of LDAP server with which the user must authenticate.
ldap-server.name: ldap-server

passwd-policy.help: Password policy to apply to this user, as defined in config user password-policy.
passwd-policy.name: passwd-policy

passwd-time.help: Time of the last password update.
passwd-time.name: passwd-time

ppk-secret.help: IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (ASCII string or hexadecimal encoded with a leading 0x).
ppk-secret.name: ppk-secret

radius-server.help: Name of RADIUS server with which the user must authenticate.
radius-server.name: radius-server

sms-server.help: Send SMS through FortiGuard or other external server.
sms-server.name: sms-server

status.help: Enable/disable allowing the local user to authenticate with the FortiGate unit.
status.name: status

tacacs+-server.help: Name of TACACS+ server with which the user must authenticate.
tacacs+-server.name: tacacs+-server

two-factor-notification.help: Notification method for user activation by FortiToken Cloud.
two-factor-notification.name: two-factor-notification

username-sensitivity.help: Enable/disable case and accent sensitivity when performing username matching (accents are stripped and case is ignored when disabled).
username-sensitivity.name: username-sensitivity

options.help: Ignore case and accents. Username at prompt not required to match case or accents.
options.name: disable

options.help: Do not ignore case and accents. Username at prompt must be an exact match.
options.name: enable

workstation.help: Name of the remote user workstation, if you want to limit the user to authenticate only from a particular workstation.
workstation.name: workstation
